name: Emotion-web
tagline: A web interface for patterns looking-up in LJ40K
body:
Feelit
===

* A web interface for patterns looking-up in LJ40K

* make sure the current internet is under the `*.iis.sinia.edu.tw` domain

## Usage
  
  ```python
  
# use default setting
# port: 5000
# debug: false
python server.py

# enter debug mode
python server -d # or --debug

# specified port number
python server -p 8888
  ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
